Play Tech: MFA video game testing

Dec 9, 2008

On Saturday in the Design and Technology labs, game design students offered up their recent creations to high school students for testing at Play Tech.  I filmed Joe Mauriello‘s play testing of reBug, his MFA Design and Technology thesis. Check out the video:
